item.name: Chime of Echoes
entries: While holding this chime, you gain a +1 bonus to spell attack rolls and to the saving throw DCs of your bard spells.
Your abilities that use you Bardic Inspiration dice can target creatures you can't see as long as you can hear them.

Whenever one of your Bardic Inspiration dice fails to change the outcome of an ability check, attack roll, or saving throw roll that die an additional time, but do not add it to the previous roll. If the second roll is even you regain that die.

item.name: Amulet of Spores or something
entries: Creatures you animate with Fungal Infestation gain Halo of Spores.
You can awaken your Symbiotic Entity as a Bonus Action.

item.name: Instrument of the Hokage
entries: When you cast a Bard spell using this focus you may roll {@dice 1d4} and it to the DC of that spell. Any creature affected by the spell makes its saving throw with disadvantage.
After you use this ability it cannot be used again until the next dawn.

spell.name: Soaring Harmony
entries: You sing a song that calls two tiny songbird spirits from the Faewilds to aid you.
Target a creature you can see within range and choose Villainize or Idolize.
• A creature Villainized is attacked and must make a Dexterity saving throw, or take {@damage 2d4} piercing damage. The target gains no benefit from cover for this saving throw.
• A creature Idolised will be aided and invigorated by the birds. If the target makes an attack roll before your next turn, their first roll is made with advantage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: The spell's damage increases by {@dice 2d4} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 4d4}), 11th level ({@dice 6d4}), and 17th level ({@dice 8d4}).
